title: Test functions at different memory levels
description: Strike a balance between cost and performance by automatically testing functions at varying memory levels

tools.title: Step Functions state machine generator for AWS Lambda Power Tuning

title: SQS integration is expensive
description: Lambda polls queues aggressively, looking for messages to send to functions. For low volumes of messages, this will get costly. Use SNS or Step Functions instead
